page.title: 18PUBLIC BUS SERVICE
page.content: We asked 5 local people what they thought about public transport in the area. All agreed that the bus service was too expensive, left at inconvenient times, and was not frequent enough.An old lady said that she found it difficult to reach railways, hospitals and libraries and that there was no bus service from Predannack, where many old people live, into Mullion. A disabled woman said that there is no consideration for old or disabled people: there are no small buses operating over small distances for such people's convenience.{Actual bus times:}Helston _Mullion _ The Lizard (Mon,Tues,Thurs, Sat).Depart Helston 13.25,17.15 arrive Mullion 13.54,17.44. The Lizard _ Mullion _ Helston. Depart Mullion 10.20,14.55,18.45, arrive Helston 10.47,15.22,19.12.
